gallery.title: Lenovo Thinkpad Yoga 370
gallery.description: A versatile 13'' business convertible with a Full HD touchscreen and included stylus. This 2-in-1 laptop features 8GB of RAM, 256GB SSD,and a durable, backlit keyboard,easily adapting between laptop, tent, stand and tablet modes.

gallery.title: 1N4007 Diode
gallery.description: The 1N4007 is a ubiquitous general-purpose rectifier diode used to convert alternating current (AC) to direct current (DC). It is known for its high voltage tolerance of up to 1000V, a 1A average forward current rating, and low cost. The 1N4007 belongs to the 1N400x series of diodes, with the signifying a one - junction semiconductor device.

gallery.title: 1N5122 Zener Diode
gallery.description: The 1N5122 is a 5 - Watt silicon Zener diode used for voltage regulation and transient voltage protection.

gallery.title: 2 X 2 Keypad
gallery.description: This generic 2 x 2 keypad is custom made to have 4 keys with a 2 x 2 matrix and an independent middle key which makes it easy to interface with your favorite microcontroller. It can be used for inserting 4 digit passwords in an embedded systems project with a single key that can be configured as the confirmation key.

gallery.title: 10K Potentiometer
gallery.description: A 10K potentiometer is a variable resistor with a maximum resistance of 10,000 ohms 10K ohm) It has three terminals and is used to manually control the amount of resistance in a circuit, which in turn controls the voltage or current.

gallery.title: 16 X 2 LCD Display
gallery.description: A 16x2 LCD is a popular display module for electronics projects, capable of showing two rows of 16 alphanumeric characters and easily controlled by microcontrollers like Arduino. It typically features an HD44780-compatible controller, backlight, and can be connected via a parallel or simpler I2C interface, making it an accessible option for displaying text and data.

gallery.title: 4047 Frequency Module
gallery.description: The 4047 Frequency module is capable of providing precise square wave signals which can be used as clock signals for simple projects. The featured model produces 1Hz which can be used with circuits that require 1Hz of clock pulse. It functions with a maximum of 15V DC. It can sink/ source a maximum of 2.4mA at 15V. To drive larger loads, include a level shifting circuit to sink or source more current.

gallery.title: 18650 Li - ion Batteries
gallery.description: Get high-quality, salvaged 18650 lithium-ion batteries with 3000mAh capacity, rigorously tested to ensure performance and reliability for your DIY projects and power needs. These cells offer a cost-effective and eco-friendly way to power a wide range of electronics, from custom power banks to high-drain devices.

gallery.title: DS1307 Serial Real Time Clock
gallery.description: The DS1307 is a low-power, binary-coded decimal (BCD) real-time clock (RTC) that communicates via an I2C serial interface. It tracks seconds, minutes, hours, date, month, and year, including leap-year compensation valid up to 2100. A key feature is its integrated power-sense circuit, which automatically switches to a backup battery supply to maintain timekeeping during a main power failure. It also includes 56 bytes of battery-backed non-volatile SRAM for storing user data.

gallery.title: DS1307 Serial RTC Module
gallery.description: This custom-made RTC module offers ultra-precise, temperature-compensated timekeeping via an I2C interface, ensuring reliable date and time functions. It features an integrated backup power system for seamless operation during main power interruptions and includes battery-backed non-volatile SRAM for user data storage. Its optimized footprint and streamlined component integration make it ideal for embedded applications requiring robust, low-power synchronization, alarm functions, and logging capabilities.
